price: Baravuga bati “Mu by’ukuri twoherejwe ku bantu b’inkozi z’ibibi (ngo tubarimbure)”,
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
